title: How to Airsoft on a Low Budget

methods.name: Getting an Airsoft Gun on a Budget

steps.headline: Look around for cheap airsoft guns.
steps.description: Do an online search for “cheap airsoft guns” or “best cheap airsoft guns.” Visit your local sporting goods store and ask someone who works there to help you find a gun in your price range. You may be able to find an airsoft gun for as low as $12 (€10.21). Keep in mind that cheap airsoft guns may not perform as well as more expensive guns. Always do your research before buying a gun.

steps.headline: Buy a used airsoft gun.
steps.description: A used airsoft gun will be cheaper than a brand new one. Search on websites like eBay and Craigslist, or put “used airsoft guns for sale” in a search engine and see what comes up. Make sure you read reviews of a seller before you buy a used gun from them. Look up how much the airsoft gun you're considering cost brand new so you know if you’re getting a good deal.

steps.headline: Rent an airsoft gun at an airsoft park.
steps.description: Many airsoft parks will let you rent a gun and ammo from them so you can play on their fields without your own equipment. If you've never done airsoft before, rent a gun first so you know if you like playing. Search online for "airsoft rentals near me" or visit the websites of local airsoft parks to see if they offer rentals.

steps.headline: Ask a friend if you can borrow their airsoft gun.
steps.description: Make sure it’s someone you won’t be playing with or they’ll need the gun for themselves. Take extra care when handling someone else’s airsoft gun. You don’t want to damage it and have to pay them.

steps.headline: Get a fanny pack to use as an airsoft belt.
steps.description: Look for a pack that’s black, brown, or green so it blends in with the rest of your airsoft outfit. Keep your extra magazines, ammo, and other supplies inside the pack. Clip your canteen on the strap around your waist. You can also attach other pouches to the strap to carry additional gear.

steps.headline: Look for a cheap airsoft mask.
steps.description: Don’t skip wearing a mask or try to make your own in order to save money. Keep your eyes and face safe with a cheap mask designed specifically for airsoft. Search online for “cheapest airsoft masks” or visit your local sporting goods store and ask someone there to help you find one. Read reviews of a mask before buying it so you know it’s safe to use.

steps.headline: Use a detachable duffel bag strap in place of a sling.
steps.description: A sling attaches to your airsoft gun and wraps around your body so your gun can hang from your shoulders. A detachable duffel bag strap can be used as a cost-efficient version of a sling. Take the two plastic clasps on each end of the strap and attach them to your airsoft gun. Wrap the strap over your shoulders and you’re good to go.

steps.headline: Get exercise gloves instead of airsoft gloves.
steps.description: You can find exercise gloves online or at your local sporting goods store that are cheaper than airsoft gloves. Make sure the gloves you get have a good grip so you can securely hold your airsoft gun when you're playing.

steps.headline: Check your wardrobe to see if you already own clothes you can wear.
steps.description: Look for long pants and shirts that are green, brown, black, or khaki. Avoid clothes in bright colors like red, blue, yellow, and orange. Don’t worry if the clothes aren't camouflaged or a high-end airsoft brand. You just need clothes that will cover your body and help you blend in.

steps.headline: Get clothes at a used-clothing store.
steps.description: You may be able to find everything you need for cheaper than buying brand new clothes. Look for long pants and a long-sleeve shirt in dark, neutral colors. You might even find something camouflage. Make sure the clothes are in your size before you buy them so you’re comfortable when you’re playing. Don’t know where the nearest used-clothing store is? Search online for “used-clothing store near me” or “thrift store near me.”

steps.headline: Look for clothes in the clearance sections of online airsoft stores.
steps.description: Do an online search for “airsoft clothes” or “discount airsoft clothes.” Visit different online stores and look for a clearance section on their website. You may be able to find high-quality airsoft clothes within your budget that are on sale.
